roleset.name: go by, as time

example.name: one example
example.text: But the Beebes didn't come to that conclusion until time limits had elapsed for adding the adhesives maker as a defendant in the case, Ms. Adams said.
example.arg: for adding the adhesives maker as a defendant in the case,

roleset.note: ELAPSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'elapse' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from elapse.01-v predicate notes)
